Description: 2016 EVH Wolfgang Special Black 6-String Electric Guitar Made In Mexico Item Description:You are bidding on a previously owned and in excellent playing condition 2016 EVH Wolfgang Special electric guitar. This auction is for the guitar you see pictured. No trem bar or case is included. It comes as pictured. Please take a moment to look at the pictures and get a better idea of what you are bidding on. This guitar has a couple scratches in the matte coating from being moved around. The headstock is in great shape. The frets and neck are in excellent condition and it does not look like it has seen much play. It has been play tested and is in excellent playing condition. If you have any questions, please feel free to ask! Please take a moment to check out my other great items!
